ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, this class is similiar to hybrids.  The rules about who can go with whom still apply, but there are some differences: Instead of the two characters

Yep, this class is similiar to hybrids.  The rules about who can go 
with whom still apply, but there are some differences:

Instead of the two characters becoming one new character, there is an 
exchange of abilities and the two characters SHARE their health 
literally.  The armor and experience level of each one goes together 
to produce an initial health level that is the same for both.  Any 
time that either one loses (or gains) health points, the other one 
loses (or gains) the exact same amount of health points.
